DYNAMIC_WEIGHTS_VERSION.description: The weights version for synthetic jobs

items.reason: enable more robust validator job timing and scoring

DYNAMIC_MANIFEST_SCORE_MULTIPLIER.description: The bonus rate for miners changing their horde size

DYNAMIC_BLOCK_FINALIZATION_NUMBER.description: After this many blocks pass, a block can be considered final

items.reason: Before 3 blocks pass, subtensor may be in disagreement

DYNAMIC_COMMIT_REVEAL_WEIGHTS_ENABLED.description: This should be synced with the hyperparam

DYNAMIC_COMMIT_REVEAL_WEIGHTS_INTERVAL.description: In blocks. This should be synced with the hyperparam

items.reason: This value assures the reveal happens after two epochs

DYNAMIC_COMMIT_REVEAL_COMMIT_START_OFFSE.description: In blocks. The offset separating commit and reveal windows in the commit-reveal interval

items.reason: Use the first epoch for revealing and the second for committing

DYNAMIC_COMMIT_REVEAL_COMMIT_END_BUFFER.description: In blocks. The buffer at the end of the commit window, in which no further commiting allowed.

items.reason: Ensure commiting does not happen outside of the window

DYNAMIC_COMMIT_REVEAL_REVEAL_END_BUFFER.description: In blocks. The buffer at the end of the reveal window, in which no further revealing allowed.

items.reason: Ensure revealing does not happend outside of the window

DYNAMIC_MAX_WEIGHT.description: This should be synced with the hyperparam
